Koya]] in [[Ito District, Wakayama|Ito District]], [[Wakayama Prefecture|Wakayama]], [[Japan]]. The town is known as the headquarters of the [[Shingon]] sect of [[Japanese Buddhism]]. As of October 1, 2010, the town has an estimated [[population]] of 3,879 and a [[population density|density]] of 28.30 persons per km². The total area is 137.08 km². ==External links== {{Commons category-inline|Koya, Wakayama|Kōya, Wakayama}} *[http://www.town.koya.wakayama.jp/ Kōya official website] {{ja icon}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Koya, Wakayama}} [[Category:Towns in Wakayama Prefecture]] {{Wakayama-geo-stub}}
